dict.acceptation: 刀片，剑；（壳、草等的）叶片；桨叶；浮华少年；

sent.orig: Effect of compress blade cascade used bow blade on blade surface boundary flow stability and turbulence.
sent.trans: 本文研究了压气机叶栅中采用弯叶片对叶片表面流动稳定及转捩的影响。

sent.orig: Blade coater: Machine for blade coating.
sent.trans: 刮刀涂布机：用刮刀把涂剂涂布的机器。

sent.orig: C is a selected blade lift coefficient at the blade tips.
sent.trans: C是在叶尖处的选定叶片升力系数。

sent.orig: And the system Gezhongfeibiao Machine Saw Blade, machine blade, razor blades and various pieces of woodworking.
sent.trans: 并代制各种非标机用锯条，机用刀片，木工刀片及各种坯料。

sent.orig: The ideal slice section can be acquired with either the standardized blade or the one-off blade.
sent.trans: 无论使用标准切片刀或一次性刀片均可获得理想的切片。
